items.name: Sophie R.
items.text: Really smooth experience — quick fitting, clean gear, and a team that actually cares. On the slopes in minutes.

items.name: Mark T.
items.text: Rented equipment for the whole family. Everything was prepared in advance, kids' sets fit perfectly. Stress-free start to our ski days.

items.name: Chen Wei
items.text: Top-quality premium skis and very helpful staff. They adjusted everything properly and gave useful local advice.

items.name: Alexey K.
items.text: Very convenient service — they quickly selected a set, no extra hassle, everything to the point. Excellent condition of equipment.

items.name: Nino G.
items.text: Took a private lesson and felt the difference immediately. Clear explanations, calm pace, and real progress in one session.

items.name: Aruzhan S.
items.text: Stylish shop, friendly atmosphere, and well-maintained equipment. Booking was easy and everything matched expectations.
